resources.string: It is your TV hang-out. See what your friends are watching and talking about, what is hot and what is not on TV. Chat along, join your friends or invite them to watch togetherâ€¦

Hi Guys! Apptarix TV is the coolest way to watch TV ; Join me and explore the what people like on TV, and watch your favorite program together with friends and let the world know what you think about it.
Invite your facebook friends here and watching TV will be even more fun!
